sentences.en: All three structures dated to the third century and were tentatively identified as shrines.
sentences.cn: 这3座建筑都建于3世纪,并且初步鉴定为神庙.

sentences.en: ASEAN has branched out tentatively into the security business.
sentences.cn: 东盟已经尝试将合作范围拓展到安全领域。

sentences.en: Classification of the Haemophilus - like bacterium has been only tentatively determined.
sentences.cn: 在分类上把这种细菌只是暂时性地作为类嗜血杆菌.

sentences.en: Divided and thwarted in the 1920's, the various components of progressivism came tentatively together in 1932.
sentences.cn: 20年代发生分裂与受到挫折后, 各种各样进步主义派别在1932年暂时团结起来.

sentences.en: He tentatively confirmed my sounds, clearly startled to heard me uttering them.
sentences.cn: 他初步确证了我的发音, 而且显然对听到我能发出这些语音来吃了一惊.

sentences.en: I tentatively decided, unless conditions should improve , to divert the expedition into Gibraltar.
sentences.cn: 我临时决定, 除非情况转佳,将远征军开向直布罗陀.

sentences.en: I tentatively suggested that she might be happier working somewhere else.
sentences.cn: 我试探性地建议换个地方工作她可能会更开心.

sentences.en: Jorden and Egypt were tentatively feeling their way toward negotiation.
sentences.cn: 约旦和埃及正在初步摸索通向谈判的道路.

sentences.en: Let's tentatively say next Wednesday at four o'clock p.m.
sentences.cn: 我们暂时约定下星期三下午四点.

sentences.en: Perhaps, he suggested tentatively, they should send for Dr Band.
sentences.cn: 他小心地建议道，也许他们应该让人去请班德大夫。

sentences.en: Rogers was slated to go in the summer, tentatively to be replaced by Kenneth Rush.
sentences.cn: 罗杰斯定于明年夏季离职, 暂定由肯尼思·拉什替换他.

sentences.en: Rotation of picea asperata for pulpwood was tentatively determined as 25 year.
sentences.cn: 初步认为云杉纸浆材培育周期为25年.

sentences.en: She glanced tentatively at Selden's motionless profile for a while.
sentences.cn: 她盯着赛尔登一动不动的侧脸仔细看了一会.

sentences.en: The meeting was tentatively scheduled to be held Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 这个会议暂定于星期二举行.

sentences.en: The next round of talks is tentatively scheduled to begin October 21st in Washington.
sentences.cn: 下一轮会谈暂定于10月21日在华盛顿开始。

sentences.en: The software tentatively assigns each click a letter based on its frequency , then tests the message created by this assignment using statistical models of the English language .
sentences.cn: 这一软件尝试性地按频率指派给每一个点击一个字母，然后用英语的统计模式测试这一指派所产生的信息。

words.tran_cn: 试验性的，暂定的；踌躇的
用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿

trans.tran_cn: 试验性地，暂时地，权，聊且
